data.message: Hello. Is there any way how can I create a pool like this on my business page? Thank you very much for response. :)

replies.message: Hi Diana. Polls are not currently available on all Pages. If this is a feature you'd like to see on Facebook, let us know by leaving your feedback here:  ﻿https://www.facebook.com/help/feedback/?ref=gfmod﻿. Thanks! -Caitlin
Thank you for response. I will leave a feedback than.

Its not for new conservative profiles btw just a heads up....
Not saying you are one....
At any rate facebook clearly determined not everyone gets the same equal privileges
Facebook I submitted the form. I'd love to have this feature for my page.

My business page has been disabled.
I got a rather large shock this afternoon when I logged on to check my facebook business page I have recently launched, to find that my account had been disabled and I had no idea why. I clicked a link on the log on page which explained that my account had been disabled because Facebook had deemed it a fake account and that I had violated the terms and conditions. I found an appeals email address and just got a reply saying that I have "reached them at a channel they do not support". There was no warning, no emails, no notifications to say I'd been reported or anything like that. No help for genuine cases like myself and so many others I've seen. So much for using social media for marketing... All I want to know is did I do something wrong and can I get my page
